name: Paragliding
description: Paragliding in Kazbegi offers breathtaking views of the Caucasus Mountains and the iconic Gergeti Trinity Church. Experience the thrill of soaring through the sky while enjoying stunning landscapes.

name: Rock Climbing
description: Chiatura is known for its unique rock formations and abandoned cable cars. Experience the thrill of rock climbing in this fascinating location, surrounded by stunning views and rich history.

name: Diving
description: Diving in Martvili offers a unique experience in the beautiful Martvili Canyon. Explore the crystal-clear waters and stunning underwater landscapes while enjoying the tranquility of nature.

name: Horse Riding
description: Horse riding in Khevsureti allows you to explore the stunning landscapes of the region. Ride through picturesque valleys, ancient villages, and breathtaking mountain trails while immersing yourself in the natural beauty of Georgia.

name: Hiking
description: Vashlovani National Park offers a unique hiking experience with its diverse landscapes, including semi-desert areas, canyons, and lush forests. Explore the park's rich biodiversity while enjoying the tranquility of nature.
